publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-548 Tommy Sheridan: Tax Relief on Ministerial Vehicles—That the Parliament notes with surprise that the tax relief for ministerial cars and chauffeurs has been extended to Scottish Executive Ministers; believes that this represents a fundamental inequality in tax treatment and calls upon Scottish Executive Ministers to make a £5,000 donation to the NHS in lieu of their tax bill.
